ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning

A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning

name: ml_dtypes

about.summary: A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning
A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: ml_dtypes
  version: 0.5.4

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/ml_dtypes-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8ab06a50fb9bf9666dd0fe5dfb4676fa2b0ac0f31ecff72a6c3af8e22c063453

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - python
        - numpy
  host:
    - python
    - numpy
    - setuptools
    - pip
    - wheel
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - ml_dtypes

about:
  summary: A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning
  license: MPL-2.0 AND Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.eigen
    - LICENSE
  homepage: https://pypi.org/project/ml-dtypes/
  repository: https://github.com/jax-ml/ml_dtypes
  documentation: https://github.com/jax-ml/ml_dtypes

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ngam
    - xhochy

about.summary: A stand-alone implementation of several NumPy dtype extensions used in machine learning
